author: greytoc
body:
Company stocks can fall and it can take years and sometimes decades to recover. 

There were quite a few well known high-flying tech stocks in the 90's and early 2000's that never recovered or are only now recovering.  The ones that always pop into my mind include Cisco, Intel, GE, Akamai, VeriSign, Checkpoint. Citrix. I'm sure there are more examples including companies that eventually failed or were delisted. 

And please don't ask me why they pop into my mind.
